title: Can't log in
body:
The client opens, I click launch and it takes me to the log in screen, I type in my password and press enter, it starts authentication process, then once it get to logging in with the loading symbol it takes a while then comes up with

"Connection Error: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server.

Information regarding what may cause this can be found here

Service availability blah blah blah"

I have clicked the "here" link and tried everything on it suggests to no avail. It was working fine yesterday and over the weekend.

Help please!

replies.body: why am i banned im suspended permanently for wht i have been playin thesssse game for a long time plzz give my account back
You might want to submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about that.

What OS are you on, and who's your ISP?

How many attempts does it take to deduce that it cannot connect?
